name: PropBank Semantic Role Annotations
summary: Syntax highlighting for PropBank Semantic Role Annotations
description:
Syntax highlighting for PropBank Semantic Role Annotations. 
[http://www.cs.rochester.edu/~gildea/PropBank/Sort/]

The highlighting patterns are based on the following css:
[http://www.cs.rochester.edu/~gildea/pb_style.css]

Screenshot: [http://wuzhaojun.googlepages.com/propbank.png]
install_details:
1. download and store it in ~/.vim/syntax/;
2. enter ":setfiletype propbank" to apply it on current window.
